Name: MicroTown
About the game: Build and manage your growing town in this relaxing village construction and management simulator with focus on production chains and villager desires. Start with nothing and grow into a bustling town. Gather and process resources and maintain your villager needs Collect and record knowledge, research and advance through technologies, and unlock new materials and professions. Establish many production chains with unique processing buildings and outputs. Everything from mining ores and crafting tools to growing crops and brewing beer. Mr. Piggles agrees.
Meta Title: MicroTown: Aug 30, 2019, Snowy Ash Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MicroTown? Check out the release date (Aug 30, 2019), developer insights from Snowy Ash Games, and a complete game summary.
